notes.text: Walkthrough: Load UI5 from openui5.hana, not openui5beta
m.TimePicker: Typing a value in the focused slider selects that value
m.ViewSettingsDialog: Filter search field added inside filter detail page
m.ViewSettingsDialog: Select All checkbox added inside filter detail page
sap.m.DatePicker: Display 2 calendar types in calendar
sap.m.DatePicker: enable soft-keyboard on mobile devices
sap.m.DateTimeInput: Deprecated.
sap.m.DynamicContainer: Renamed to sap.m.SlideTile
sap.m.FlexBox: New options for wrapping and aligning content
sap.m.GenericTile: Consistent tooltip handling implemented
sap.m.GenericTile: JSDoc updated
sap.m.GenericTile: JSDoc updated
sap.m.JamContent: Renamed to sap.m.FeedContent
sap.m.MultiInput: new API - maxTokens
sap.m.NotificatonListItem: Added property to enable text truncation
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: explored example
sap.m.Popover: new "contentMinWidth" property added
sap.m.RadioButton: Keyboard handling with arrows added
sap.m.TimePicker: Enable soft-keyboard on mobile devices
sap.m.ValueCSSColor: introduce new DataType as extention of sap.m.ValueColor
sap.m.Wizard: Show grouped steps in an ActionSheet
sap.m.Wizard: Show titles in step navigator
sap.ui.layout.form.Form: allow Toolbars as Title
DataState: Repair DataState Propagation
Demo Applications: master-detail remove UShell dependency
Explored: Changed content of floorplans to avoid dependencies
Flip animation now works in IE and it doesn't show the next page before navigating
SAP Fiori Client for Windows Phone 10: hidden text area
explored app: fix sap.m.SelectList sample
focused TextArea is hidden in Fiori Client for Windows Phone
m.SegmentedButton: In compact mode icons in buttons without text are now centered
sap.m..Dialog: Origin parameter set is fixed
sap.m.ActionSheet: set correct height on phone when buttons are added after opening of the ActionSheet
sap.m.Bar: sap.m.Label displayed correctly
sap.m.BusyDialog: can be opened right after the initialization.
sap.m.Button: icon is not centered
sap.m.Carousel: TextArea inside a Carousel can accept '-' and '+' now
sap.m.Carousel: the arrows are now visible when the control is in focus
sap.m.ComboBox: fix dropdown button alignment issue
sap.m.CustomListItem: Outline should be visible.
sap.m.Dialog with width set on the content now looks same in RTL and LTR mode
sap.m.Dialog: prevent blurred text
sap.m.Dialog: set content section height on windows and content resize
sap.m.Dialog: tap on header (draggable) and rerender will no longer break the postion
sap.m.FeedInput: CSS focus offset on IE improved
sap.m.FeedInput: Css class improved
sap.m.FeedListItem: Unread property disabled
sap.m.FlexBox: Solved issues introduced with refactoring
sap.m.GenericTile: Decreased number of rows in title if displaying Devanagari characters.
sap.m.GenericTile: Focus rendering improved
sap.m.GenericTile: Icon aggregation deprecated
sap.m.IconTabBar: Arrows position in Win8 is correct now
sap.m.IconTabBar: Fixed selecting new element when selected element is removed
sap.m.IconTabHeader: Selection is correct when IconTabHeader is used standalone
sap.m.Image: should return this in public methods
sap.m.Input in a Table cell: no tabular suggestions
sap.m.Input, sap.m.DatePicker: wrong value help icon
sap.m.Input: binding exception of the setShowSuggestion property
sap.m.InputBase: change duration to open message popup to zero
sap.m.InputBase: fix border issue at zoom in < 100% (hcb theme)
sap.m.ListItemBase: Focus outlines for items corrected for IE
sap.m.MessageBox: Fixed blur effect on large screens
sap.m.MessagePopover: move description on a new line when it is too small
sap.m.MultiComboBox: dropdown list automatically size itself to fit its content
sap.m.NotificationListItem/Group: sets focus to its parent when destroyed.
sap.m.NotificationListItem: Fixed mouse events when item is focused
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: Click outside the text does not count as click
sap.m.ObjectHeader: Active ObjectAttribute works on IE
sap.m.ObjectHeader: RemoveAllAggregations now works properly
sap.m.ObjectNumber: ValueStateSupport used to enrich the tooltip
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Vertical alignment inside forms corrected
sap.m.OverflowToolbar - enabled sap.m.Slider to be used in the toolbar
sap.m.P13nColumnsPanel - support of i18n resource model for table item text
sap.m.P13nDialog - text in warning dialog changed
sap.m.PlacementType: Preferred types with a typo deprecated and new added with correct names
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: several issues
sap.m.Popover: Popover places itself with correct offset when Left or Top placement is used.
sap.m.Popover: calc position now works correctly when a svg element is used for opener control.
sap.m.PullToRefresh: busy indicator overlaps text
sap.m.QuickView: Exception is no longer thrown when navigating
sap.m.QuickView: Removed SMS icon on desktop browsers
sap.m.QuickView: Removed empty links from DOM
sap.m.RadioButton: z-index of the focus before removed
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: Area attribute should not be set to invisible buttons
sap.m.ScrollContainer, sap.ui.layout.FixFlex: A tweak, causing issues in Internet Explorer is now removed
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Correctly aligned on iOS in Toolbar
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Sets hover background only on desktop
sap.m.Select: fix auto close issue of the dropdown list in IE
sap.m.Select: prevent IE to focus non-focusable elements
sap.m.SlideTile: Empty content leads to error corrected
sap.m.Slider: improve multi-touch support
sap.m.SplitContainer: Remove swipe on desktop
sap.m.TabStripSelectRenderer: fix initial rendering exception
sap.m.Table: Loading message should not be shown if re-rendering happens.
sap.m.TableSelectDialog: busyIndicatorDelay propagation fixed
sap.m.TextArea: Default for wrapping property in constructor.
sap.m.TextArea: escaping in IE10 is fixed.
sap.m.TileContent: Reliability of tooltip handling mechanism improved
sap.m.Tokenizer: not set focus back after token deletion in phone mode
sap.m.Tokenizer: tokenizer is not in tabchain if it is not in standalone use
sap.m.UploadCollection: Toolbar in Explored samples replaced by OverflowToolbar to ensure responsiveness of mobile devices
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Improved documentation for collecting the settings of custom tabs
sap.m.Wizard - goToStep() method returns if the wizard is not visible.
sap.m.Wizard - prevents an endless loop if the developer calls 2 times in a row the goToStep() method
sap.m.Wizard - removed the focus on furst element on step changed on mobile devices.
sap.m: add library info to semantic elements/controls
sap.ui.layout.form.Form: Label not visible on iOS devices
sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: Abort in case of parellel uploads corrected
sap/m/ViewSettingsDialog.js : mark sPageId as optional
sap.m.GrowingEnablement: Growing button should not fire itemPress event.
BusyIndicator: Faster Adding of DOM
Support Dialog: Fixed opening the support dialog on Windows Phone
TextArea placement in Fiori Client Windows Phone
m.Page: Start in qUnit Async-Test Moved
sap.m.ActionSheet - invinsible buttons are not included in the navigation list group
sap.m.Carousel - Content scrolling in IE and FF is now correct
sap.m.Carousel: Keyboard handling in IE is correct now
sap.m.Carousel: Shift+F7 functionality is now correct
sap.m.Checkbox fixed position in form on compact size
sap.m.ComboBox: exclude disable items from the auto-complete suggestion list
sap.m.DatePicker: if date is deleted open calendar on today
sap.m.DatePicker: issues with date > 99991231
sap.m.GenericTile: Rendering of samples improved
sap.m.Input suggestions: avoid unneeded list refreshes
sap.m.InputBase: remove max-width of value state message
sap.m.InputBase: support valuestate popup in LTR
sap.m.ListItemBase: change flex style to support CustomListItem in IE
sap.m.NumericContent: The icon size is corrected
sap.m.ObjectHeader: fix add and remove Attribute/Status
sap.m.Panel: The ariaLabelledBy association of the expand icon is correctly updated
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: appointments in new line if invisible
sap.m.QuickViewCard: Scrolling position when navigate is correct now
sap.m.RadioButton: Fixes an issue with clicking two times on a button to select it
sap.m.SegmentedButton: cursor pointer over icon is set to 'pointer' instead of 'default'.
sap.m.Select: prevents actions from occurring when the control is disabled in IE11
sap.m.Tokenizer: add focus border
sap.m.UploadCollection: Items aggregation handling improved in case instandUpload is false
sap.m.UploadCollection: Managing event delegates improved
sap.m.Popover: Popover places itself with correct offset when Left"
sap.m.UploadCollection: Download methods on API level provided
Fieldgroup check is not done for sub-controls
Update library description for sap.m
Update the sap.m library description and make it consistent
m.ViewSettingsCustomItem: customControl is cloned as expected
m.ViewSettingsDialog: Destroy of filter item does not throw errors
m.ViewSettingsDialog: No console errors on cancel
sap.m.Bar: Size of the middle content is now correct
sap.m.Dialog: Focus issue solved
sap.m.FacetFilter: After reset, category items are now properly displayed
sap.m.FlexBox: Corrected width of VBoxes with explicit base size
sap.m.GenericTile: Border, hover and focus changed in CSS
sap.m.GenericTile: Tooltip handling updated
sap.m.GroupHeaderListItem: Should respect the base outline settings.
sap.m.IconTabBar scroll arrow shows correct on phone
sap.m.IconTabBar: setSelectedItem method is working correctly now
sap.m.MessageBox: Dependency to sap.ui.layout package is now removed
sap.m.MessageStrip: JSDoc of the metadata updated
sap.m.MultiInput
sap.m.MultiInput: remove old tokenizer indicator in phone mode
sap.m.ObjectHeader: Image preserves aspect ratio
sap.m.ObjectListItem: Attribute and Statuses columns take equal space
sap.m.ObjectListItem: ObjectNumber inside has correct contrast ratio in high contrast black theme
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Appointment wrong positioned
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: don't select row if in 1 row mode
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: wrong rendering if small area on desktop
sap.m.SegmentedButton - Bluecrystal theme hover and borders are now ok
sap.m.TileContainer: Arrows' click behaviour in firefox is now handled properly
sap.m.Tokenizer: remove tab index if tokenizer is in MultiInput
sap.m.UploadCollection: Fixed visual design for checkbox in single and multi selection mode
sap.m.SplitContainer: Popover mode is fixed
NavContainer didn't get properly invalidated
m.Dialog,commons.Dialog,ux3.ToolPopup: Preserve Content on Remove
sap.m.FlexBox: Hide wrapper if no layout data is set
sap.m.FlexBox: Invisible nested FlexBox rendered correctly
sap.m.FlexBox: removeItem doesn't erroneously remove its parent if the item is a FlexBox itself
sap.m.GenericTile: Sizing issue when using HCB theme fixed
sap.m.MultiInput: add new event validateOnPaste
sap.m.RadioButton: When passing null value to the setSelected function is handled as false
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: setEnabled behaviour corrected
sap.m.UploadCollection: Items aggregation handling improved in case instantUpload is false
sap.m.UploadCollection: Text for upload completed improved
sap.m.routing.Targets: fix documentation
.Dialog, ux3.ToolPopup: Preserve DOM only if rendered
openUI5 templates app - nav back fixes

sap.m.ActionSheet visual design bug fix
sap.m.Button: press event survives re-rendering

sap.m.FeedListItem: Short text always updated before displaying
sap.m.FlexBox: column flex items set to align-items:center overflow their container.
sap.m.Input: do not close dialog in phone mode if the input is MultiInput

sap.m.SearchField: no liveChange event on Escape

sap.m.Breadcrumbs was incorrectly handling its aggregations
sap.m.Carousel: Fixed nav arrows on combi devices

sap.m.GenericTile: Focus improved in CSS

sap.m.MessageToast: autoClose not called on mouseLeave

sap.m.QuickView: QuickView height is updated when data is changed
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Aria-label attribute is now properly ignored when tooltip is presented
